st:attribute.Name: MandatoryGBNState
st:attribute.st:role: Define if the geometrical bundle is mandatory
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Define if the geometrical bundle is mandatory

st:enum.st:role: Geometrical bundle is not mandatory
Geometrical bundle is mandatory

st:attribute.Name: NumberOfDocAssistanceState
st:attribute.st:role: Work with one multi-branchable per geometrical bundle

st:enum.st:role: Do not work with one multi-branchable per geometrical bundle
Work with one multi-branchable per geometrical bundle

st:attribute.Name: KeepCustomizedProdNameForGBNState
st:attribute.st:role: Use customised display for geometrical bundle naming rule

st:enum.st:role: Do not use customized display for geometrical bundle nameing rule
Use customized display for geometrical bundle nameing rule

st:attribute.Name: CurrentExtremityColor
st:attribute.st:role: Define bundle segment color

st:attribute.Name: HideInternal
st:attribute.st:role: Hide internal harness geometry

st:enum.st:role: Do not hide internal harness geometry
Hide internal harness geometry

st:attribute.Name: DefaultNameState
st:attribute.st:role: Setting to manage bundle segment naming

st:enum.st:role: Use bundle segment naming rule
Use parent-bundle segment naming rule

st:attribute.Name: GeometricLinkState
st:attribute.st:role: Activate/Deactivate geometrical link

st:enum.st:role: Deactivate geometrical link between segments
Activate geometrical link between segments

st:attribute.Name: AutoLinkState
st:attribute.st:role: Activate/Deactivate automatic link

st:enum.st:role: Deactivate automatic link to new bundle segment
Activate automatic link to new bundle segment

st:attribute.Name: AutoUnLinkState
st:attribute.st:role: Settings to remove geometrical link at unlink

st:enum.st:role: Do not remove geometrical link at unlink
Remove geometrical link at unlink

st:attribute.Name: KeepNotUsedState
st:attribute.st:role: Setting to manage the unused branch points
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Setting to manage the unused branch points

st:enum.st:role: An unused branch point is not deleted
An unused branch point is prompted for deletion

st:default.st:role: By default an unused branch point is not deleted

st:attribute.Name: CombolinkoptionsState
st:attribute.st:role: Setting for keep link with selected object

st:attribute.Name: ContextualLinkCheckState
st:attribute.st:role: Setting to forbid selection outside current geometrical bundle

st:enum.st:role: Do not forbid the selection outside current geometrical bundle
Forbid the selection outside current geometrical bundle

st:attribute.Name: SptPubVisuModeState
st:attribute.st:role: Settings to use publications to recognize adaptive supports
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: This option will be used during selective loading and extract If you activate it, only support with publication 'ELEC-SPPORT-RADIUS' will be considered as adaptive. Its highly recommneded to use it because it will make you save time when loading large assemblies containing adaptive supports.

st:enum.st:role: Do not use publications to recognize adaptive supports
Use publications to recognize adaptive supports

st:attribute.Name: ProfileTypeState
st:attribute.st:role: Settings for bundle segment profile
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Choose 'Circular profile only', to work with circular section bundle segments only. Choose 'Any profile', to work with bundle segment sections of any type.

st:enum.st:role: Use circular profile only
Use any type of profile

st:default.st:role: By default, use circular profile only

st:attribute.Name: ProfileValueState
st:attribute.st:role: Settings for bundle segment profile
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Choose 'Circular profile only', to work with circular section bundle segments only. Choose 'Any profile', to work with bundle segment sections of any type.

st:enum.st:role: Keep the greatest value constant
Keep the smallest value constant
Keep the ratio constant
Do not recompute values

st:default.st:role: By default, keep the greatest value constant is set

st:attribute.Name: AllowSystem
st:attribute.st:role: CheckButton to allow System to use a Min Bend Radius for Curve Computation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Setting to allow System to use a Min Bend Radius for Curve Computation

st:enum.st:role: Allow the system to use a smaller bend radius value
Do not allow the system to use a smaller bend radius value

st:default.st:role: By default, do not allow the system to use a smaller bend radius value

st:attribute.Name: ChoixAlgo
st:attribute.st:role: Setting to manage the algorithm used for branch routing
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Setting to manage the algorithm used for branch routing

st:enum.st:role: The standard algorithm is used for the branch routing
The FLEX algorithm is used for the branch routing

st:default.st:role: By default the formal algorithm is used for the branch routing

st:attribute.Name: AccuracyState
st:attribute.st:role: Setting to manage the balance between performance and accuracy
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Setting to manage the balance between performance and accuracy for the FLEX algorithm

st:attribute.Name: RatioCLMode
st:attribute.st:role: Setting to manage the accuracy of the final branch length in constrained length mode
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Setting to manage the accuracy of the final branch length in constrained length mode

st:default.st:role: By default the tolerance is set to one percent

st:attribute.Name: WarnOnBranchCollapse
st:attribute.st:role: Check Button to warn user when Branch collapses
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Warns the user when the Branch collapses i.e. BendRadius is less than Segment Radius

st:enum.st:role: Dont Warn user when Branch is collapsed
Warn user when Branch is collapsed

st:default.st:role: By default user gets a warning when Branch collapses

st:attribute.Name: AvoidWarningMessageRepetition
st:attribute.st:role: Check Button to avoid repetition of warning message when building curve
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Avoids repetition of warning message.i.e. when curve is broken OR when curve is built with dichotomy

st:enum.st:role: Don't avoid repetition of warning message
Avoid repetition of warning message

st:default.st:role: By default the warning message is not avoided

st:attribute.Name: CurveNotElectrical
st:attribute.st:role: Check Button to warn user when Curve is not Electrical
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Warns the user when the Curve is not Electrical

st:enum.st:role: Dont Warn user when Curve is not Electrical
Warn user when Curve is not Electrical

st:default.st:role: By default user gets warning when Curve is not Electrical

st:attribute.Name: UserBendRadNotRespected
st:attribute.st:role: Check Button to warn user when User Bend Radius is not Respected
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Warns the user when User Bend Radius is not Respected

st:enum.st:role: Dont Warn user when User Bend Radius is not Respected
Warn user when User Bend Radius is not Respected

st:default.st:role: By default user gets warning when User Bend Radius is not Respected

st:attribute.Name: BNSCollapsed
st:attribute.st:role: Check Button to warn user when BundleSegment is collapsed
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Warns the user when BundleSegment is collapsed

st:enum.st:role: Dont Warn user when BundleSegment is collapsed
Warn user when BundleSegment is collapsed

st:default.st:role: By default user gets warning when BundleSegment is collapsed

st:attribute.Name: BNSColorChange
st:attribute.st:role: Check Button to change color of BundleSegment as well
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Changes the color of BundleSegment as well

st:enum.st:role: Will not Change the color of BundleSegment as well
Will Changes the color of BundleSegment as well

st:default.st:role: By default the color of BundleSegment does not change

st:attribute.Name: BNSColorToSet
st:attribute.st:role: Color to Set.

st:attribute.Name: LocalSlackState
st:attribute.st:role: Check Button to display labels for Local Slack
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Check Button to display labels for Local Slack

st:enum.st:role: Do not display the labels for Local Slack
Display the labels for Local Slack

st:default.st:role: By default Labels should not be displayed

st:attribute.Name: PointSymbolChkBtnState
st:attribute.st:role: Check Button to display specific symbol for points when adding local slack
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays specific symbol for points when adding local slack

st:enum.st:role: Do not use specific symbol for local slack display
Use specific symbol for local slack display

st:default.st:role: By default specific symbol should not be displayed

st:attribute.Name: PointRepColorToSet
st:attribute.st:role: Define symbol color for points when adding local slack

st:attribute.Name: PointRepSymbolToSet
st:attribute.st:role: Define point representation of symbol used for points when adding local slack

st:enum.st:role: Cross
Plus
Circle
Double Circle
Dot
Full Square
Star
Small Full Square
Small Dot

st:attribute.Name: FlexToStandard
st:attribute.st:role: Checks the option of curve build
